General.Name: Anhui Huaertai Chemical Co Ltd
General.Description: Anhui Huaertai Chemical Co., Ltd. engages in the research and development, production, and sale of chemical products. It offers formaldehyde, hydrogen peroxide, ammonium sulfate, 65 niacin, sulfur trioxide, melamine, melamine powder and base material, concentrated sulfuric and nitric acid, oleum, industrial sodium nitrite and nitrate, liquid ammonia, ammonium bicarbonate, and methanol. The company was founded in 2000 and is based in Chizhou, China.
General.Address: Dongzhi Economic Development Zone, Chizhou, China, 247260
